n = int(input())
days = []
for i in range(n):
    s, t = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    days.append([s, t])

days.sort()

start = days[0][0]
end = days[0][1]

for i in range(1, n):
    if days[i][0] > end:
        start = days[i][0]
        end = days[i][1]
    elif days[i][1] > end:
        end = days[i][1]

print(end - start + 1)

import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())

days = []

for i in range(n):
    s, t = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    days.append((s, t))

days.sort()

#print(days)

day1 = days[0][0]
day2 = days[0][1]

for i in range(1, n):
    if days[i][0] <= day2:
        day2 = max(day2, days[i][1])
    else:
        day1 = days[i][0]
        day2 = days[i][1]

print(day2 - day1 + 1)

n = int(input())
schedule = []

for i in range(n):
    s, t = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    schedule.append((s, t))

schedule.sort()

days = set()

for i in range(len(schedule)):
    for j in range(schedule[i][0], schedule[i][1] + 1):
        days.add(j)

print(len(days))

n = int(input())

days = [0] * 366
for i in range(n):
    s = int(input())
    t = int(input())
    for j in range(s - 1, t):
        days[j] += 1

print(days.count(1))
